summary: The Department of Defense manages a school system that provides prekindergarten through 12th grade education—primarily for the children of military service members and other DOD employees. We reviewed academic achievement at these schools for the 4th and 8th grades. We found that, over the past decade, students at these schools generally received among the highest scores nationwide on the National Assessment of Educational Progress in...
title: K-12 Education: Students in DOD Schools Generally Score Higher Than Public School Students on National Assessments
